text: Hi there, everyone.

A Yahtzee is when you roll five
dice and they all come up
with the same number.

So it could be five ones,
five fours, five sixes.
You get the idea.

Now, I know there are lots of

idea in my head now.

So there's one thing that's
pretty obvious.

And that's just the straight
probability.
Let's quickly talk about that.
I'm rolling five dice.

When the first one comes out,
that can be a one, two, three,
four, five, or six.
It doesn't really matter.

I've decided any combination
is going to be fine.

So the probability of that
first one's irrelevant.

But the second dice
has to match.
So it's a one in six.

Then the next one
has to match.

The next one, and
the next one.
All one in six.
Multiply them all together.

And we've got a one
in 1,296 chance of
me rolling a Yahtzee.
That's what I'm up against.
Let's give it a go.
